text.autoconfig.npcvariety.title: NPC Variety Config
text.autoconfig.npcvariety.option.abunda: Indicates the probability that abundant type skins are found
text.autoconfig.npcvariety.option.common: Indicates the probability that common type skins are found
text.autoconfig.npcvariety.option.regula: Indicates the probability that regular type skins are found
text.autoconfig.npcvariety.option.uncomm: Indicates the probability that uncommon type skins are found
text.autoconfig.npcvariety.option.rareRa: Indicates the probability that rare type skins are found
text.autoconfig.npcvariety.option.conver: Villager to Zombie Villager Skin Conversion
Zombie Villager to Villager Skin Conversion
text.autoconfig.npcvariety.option.patrol: Gives the Patrol/Raid leader eye patches
text.autoconfig.npcvariety.option.natura: Allows pregenerated villagers to have skins based on biome
text.autoconfig.npcvariety.option.inheri: Allows baby villagers to inherit skins and eyes from parents
text.autoconfig.npcvariety.option.conver: Allows villager skins to be kept when a villager is converted to zombie villager
Allows zombie villager skins to be kept when a zombie villager becomes a Villager
text.autoconfig.npcvariety.option.wander: Adds variation for Wandering Trader Entities
text.autoconfig.npcvariety.option.zombie: Adds variation for Zombie Villager Entities
